holidays.title: National Nurses Day
holidays.description: We celebrate Florence Nightingale and recognize the important role nurses play in our lives.

holidays.title: National Teachers' Day
holidays.description: Everyone has had that favorite teacher that has helped inspire them.

holidays.title: Childhood Depression Awareness Day
holidays.description: Failing to provide appropriate and substantial mental health services puts the lives of kids at risk.

holidays.title: Dr. Mark A. Groh Cardiothoracic Surgeon Appreciation Day
holidays.description: If a cardiothoracic surgeon ever treated you, send them a thank you note today.

holidays.title: Joseph Brackett Day
holidays.description: Get ready for some amazing facts about Joseph Brackett and 'Simple Gifts.'

holidays.title: National Aidan Day
holidays.description: The Irish-derived name, Aidan, has gone through a journey around the world.

holidays.title: National Beverage Day
holidays.description: Whether you prefer a hot or a cold one, there is one for every taste.

holidays.title: National Crepe Suzette Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn about crepes Suzette, how they are made, and what makes them so special.

holidays.title: National Foster Care Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the people who make the foster care system work for children in need.

holidays.title: National Tony Day
holidays.description: Get together with all the Tonys and celebrate their special day today.

holidays.title: National Tourist Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Anyone who's done any traveling is likely guilty of being a tourist.

holidays.title: Poem on Your Pillow Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Poem on Your Pillow Day by slipping a poem onto a loved one’s pillow.

holidays.title: Sauvignon Blanc Day
holidays.description: Get your wine glasses and bottles ready to make a toast as we celebrate this day!

holidays.title: World Asthma Day
holidays.description: Wear a gray ribbon, and let’s help and support people suffering from Asthma.

holidays.title: Bob Seger’s Birthday
holidays.description: He refused to allow setbacks to dictate what he wanted to accomplish in life.

holidays.title: Chris Paul’s Birthday
holidays.description: Although he has never won the Championship, he has had a very productive career.

holidays.title: George Clooney’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us in honoring George Clooney, a man with exceptional skills and good looks.

holidays.title: Meek Mill’s Birthday
holidays.description: This former battle rapper has become a successful artist leading nationwide reforms.

holidays.title: Willie Mays’s Birthday
holidays.description: This sports legend powered his team to a National League win and was named the M.V.P.
